entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,0}{F813,1,414102}I come forth with the poison winds{F801}and the voices of the dead.{F801}{F802}The name is Fury Chernobog.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,0}{F813,1,414102}I come forth with the poison winds{F801}and the voices of the dead.{F801}{F802}The name is Fury Chernobog.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Chernobog\0{F87A,0}Now... As my sacrifice, you shall{F801}entertain me until I am satisfied.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Chernobog\0{F87A,0}Now... As my sacrifice, you shall{F801}entertain me until I am satisfied.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Chernobog\0{F87A,0}{F813,1,414100}Ho... I suppose you humans are much{F801}more than fragile creatures that{F801}succumb to poison...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Chernobog\0{F87A,0}{F813,1,414100}Ho... I suppose you humans are much{F801}more than fragile creatures that{F801}succumb to poison...{F801}
